# t-badge



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description              | Type      | Default |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `customClass` | `custom-class` | (required) Badge class   | `string`  | `''`    |
| `link`        | `link`         | (optional) Badge link    | `string`  | `''`    |
| `pill`        | `pill`         | (optional) Badge pill    | `boolean` | `false` |
| `size`        | `size`         | (optional) Badge size    | `string`  | `''`    |
| `variant`     | `variant`      | (optional) Badge variant | `string`  | `''`    |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                             | Description                                |
| -------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| `--badge-background-color`       | Background of the badge                    |
| `--badge-border-radius`          | Border radius of the badge                 |
| `--badge-color`                  | Color of the text of the badge             |
| `--badge-display`                | Display of the badge                       |
| `--badge-font-size`              | Font size of the badge                     |
| `--badge-font-weight`            | Font weight of the badge                   |
| `--badge-line-height`            | Line height of the badge                   |
| `--badge-link-active-background` | Active background of the link of the badge |
| `--badge-link-focus-box-shadow`  | Box shadow of the link of the badge        |
| `--badge-link-focus-outline`     | Focus outline of the link of the badge     |
| `--badge-link-hover-background`  | Hover background of the link of the badge  |
| `--badge-link-text-decoration`   | Text decoration of the link of the badge   |
| `--badge-padding`                | Padding of the badge                       |
| `--badge-pill-background-color`  | Background color of the pill of the badge  |
| `--badge-pill-border-radius`     | Border radius of the pill of the badge     |
| `--badge-pill-color`             | Color of the text of the pill of the badge |
| `--badge-pill-padding-left`      | Padding left of the pill of the badge      |
| `--badge-pill-padding-right`     | Padding right of the pill of the badge     |
| `--badge-text-align`             | Text align of the badge                    |
| `--badge-transition`             | Transition of the badge                    |
| `--badge-vertical-align`         | Vertical align of the badge                |
| `--badge-white-space`            | White space of the badge                   |
